name: [OLD] SubPrime Delivery
description:
ATTENTION!!! THE GAME IS IMPOSSIBLE BECAUSE OF A GAME BREAKING GLITCH I FOUND WAY AFTER SUBMITTING

If you want to play the fixed version of this game please play the Newgrounds version until further notice!
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/853948

I'm so sorry for this I ended finishing this very very late and I was so tired that I didn't realize it

HUGE THANKS TO MASTER CANNOLI FOR MAKING THE BACKGROUNDS! :D

MASTER CANNOLI

RECRAFTED STUDIOS

In 2069 Robots are Now Delivering Packages! :O

But Thanks to The News It's Revealed to Be That Their AI is Actually
Super Dumb...
You've Already Bought a Package and You Want to Make Sure That You Actually Get Your Package So You've Hacked Their Company to Ensure You Get Your Package

HOW TO PLAY

Hold Left Click on a Block to Drag It

Release Left Click to Drop The Block

Right Click to Delete a Block

Press Enter to Toggle Game Modes

Use WASD to The Camera in Long Levels

Press F to Enter Fullscreen

Press R to Reset Level

this game can be quite challenging at times 
and you might need to think the outside box

you'll need to drag and drop many different types of blocks to help the robot maneuver the level and once the robot collides with one of those blocks it will do a action based of of the block so if its a jump block it will jump, if its a flip block reverse the direction its going in and so on

you can also put blocks on top of each other to make them like chain reactions so like putting flip block on top of a jump block is very good for small vertical spaces

Adventure Theme by Music by Cleyton Kauffman
https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman

sorry if the game seems unbalanced or unfinished I didn't realize that my first day of school on started August 15 and I really wanted to get this game done because I haven't made a new game in ages so I stayed up really late to ensure I finished it

ALSO ON NEWGROUNDS
